actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Subcommittee on Water Resources. Hearings held.

official_title: A bill to authorize the imposition of entrance, admission or additional user fees at certain water resources development areas administered by the Department of the Army.

summary.text: Amends the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to authorize entrance or admission fees at certain water resource development areas administered by the Department of the Army. Repeals the requirement that each lake or reservoir, under the Corps of Engineers jurisdiction, have at least one primitive campground where no charge is imposed. Amends the Flood Control Act of 1968 to repeal certain prohibitions against the collection of entrance or admission fees at public recreation areas located at lakes and reservoirs under the jurisdiction of the Corps of Engineers.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the imposition of entrance, admission or additional user fees at certain water resources development areas administered by the Department of the Army.
